title: Invincible, Vol. 12: Still Standing
description: Angstrom Levy finally attacks - and the world has never been in moredanger! Guest-starring the entire Image Universe... and this is justa lead-in for CONQUEST! Invincible faces his most deadly threats yetin this can't-miss volume of the critically-acclaimed series.Collects Invincible #60-65
author: Robert Kirkman
